example.text: LIVE: As Republicans demand major cuts that would cause incalculable damage to the lives of working Americans, Senate Democrats are urging President Biden to prepare to invoke the 14th Amendment to avoid a catastrophic debt default. [[url]]

She was instrumental in the development and implementation of major disability rights legislation, including the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act--IDEA--the Americans with Disabilities Act, and the UN Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities. She was a true public servant having served as the Assistant Secretary for the Office of Special Education and Rehabilitative Services in the Department of Education from 1993 to 2001 and as the first Special Advisor for International Disability Rights at the Department of State from 2010 to 2017.
